Package core

Interface HlaReferenceFrameValueListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HlaReferenceFrameValueListener.Adapter
    public interface HlaReferenceFrameValueListener
    Listener for updates of attributes, with the new updated values.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  HlaReferenceFrameValueListener.Adapter
      An abstract adapter class that implements the HlaReferenceFrameValueListener interface with empty methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void nameUpdated​(HlaReferenceFrame referenceFrame, java.lang.String name, boolean validOldName, java.lang.String oldName, HlaTimeStamp timeStamp, HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
      This method is called when the attribute name is updated.
      void parentNameUpdated​(HlaReferenceFrame referenceFrame, java.lang.String parentName, boolean validOldParentName, java.lang.String oldParentName, HlaTimeStamp timeStamp, HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
      This method is called when the attribute parentName is updated.
      void producingFederateUpdated​(HlaReferenceFrame referenceFrame, HlaReferenceFrameAttributes.Attribute attribute, HlaFederateId oldProducingFederate, HlaFederateId newProducingFederate, HlaTimeStamp timeStamp, HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
      This method is called when the producing federate of an attribute is changed.
      void stateUpdated​(HlaReferenceFrame referenceFrame, SpaceTimeCoordinateState state, boolean validOldState, SpaceTimeCoordinateState oldState, HlaTimeStamp timeStamp, HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
      This method is called when the attribute state is updated.

    • Method Detail

      • nameUpdated

        void nameUpdated​(HlaReferenceFrame referenceFrame,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 boolean validOldName,
                 java.lang.String oldName,
                 HlaTimeStamp timeStamp,
                 HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
        This method is called when the attribute name is updated.
        Description from the FOM: A unique name for this reference frame instance. Reference frame names are essential in forming 'links' between parent/child reference frames.
        Description of the data type from the FOM:
        Parameters:
        referenceFrame - The object which is updated.
        name - The new value of the attribute in this update
        validOldName - True if oldName contains a valid value
        oldName - The old value of the attribute
        timeStamp - The time when the update was initiated.
        logicalTime - The logical time when the update was initiated.

      • parentNameUpdated

        void parentNameUpdated​(HlaReferenceFrame referenceFrame,
                       java.lang.String parentName,
                       boolean validOldParentName,
                       java.lang.String oldParentName,
                       HlaTimeStamp timeStamp,
                       HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
        This method is called when the attribute parentName is updated.
        Description from the FOM: The name of this frame's parent reference frame. If this frame has no parent (i.e., is a 'root' reference frame), then this string must be empty, otherwise the non-empty string must correspond to the name attribute of some other ReferenceFrame object instance in the simulation.
        Description of the data type from the FOM:
        Parameters:
        referenceFrame - The object which is updated.
        parentName - The new value of the attribute in this update
        validOldParentName - True if oldParentName contains a valid value
        oldParentName - The old value of the attribute
        timeStamp - The time when the update was initiated.
        logicalTime - The logical time when the update was initiated.

      • stateUpdated

        void stateUpdated​(HlaReferenceFrame referenceFrame,
                  SpaceTimeCoordinateState state,
                  boolean validOldState,
                  SpaceTimeCoordinateState oldState,
                  HlaTimeStamp timeStamp,
                  HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
        This method is called when the attribute state is updated.
        Description from the FOM: A four dimensional representation of the reference frame with respect to its parent reference frame. If the parent fame is an empty string, then only the time dimension has meaning.
        Description of the data type from the FOM: A multi-dimensional representation of an observational coordinate frame and associated state. There are three spatial dimensions, three attitude dimensions and one time dimension. The spatial and attitude components define a right-handed orthogonal set of coordinate axes that constitute a reference frame. The time dimension specifies the 'position' of the coordinate with respect to the physical time scale (TT).
        Parameters:
        referenceFrame - The object which is updated.
        state - The new value of the attribute in this update
        validOldState - True if oldState contains a valid value
        oldState - The old value of the attribute
        timeStamp - The time when the update was initiated.
        logicalTime - The logical time when the update was initiated.

      • producingFederateUpdated

        void producingFederateUpdated​(HlaReferenceFrame referenceFrame,
                              HlaReferenceFrameAttributes.Attribute attribute,
                              HlaFederateId oldProducingFederate,
                              HlaFederateId newProducingFederate,
                              HlaTimeStamp timeStamp,
                              HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
        This method is called when the producing federate of an attribute is changed. Only available when using HLA Evolved.
        Parameters:
        referenceFrame - The object which is updated.
        attribute - The attribute that now has a new producing federate
        oldProducingFederate - The federate handle of the old producing federate
        newProducingFederate - The federate handle of the new producing federate
        timeStamp - The time when the update was initiated.
        logicalTime - The logical time when the update was initiated.
